title: Selecting appropriate cellulose morphology to enhance the nitrogen content of nitrocellulose
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28260-28271
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04172K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Raden Reza Rizkiansyah, Y. Mardiyati, Arief Hariyanto, Tatacipta Dirgantara
An appropriate cellulose morphology capable of enhancing the nitration process of nitrocellulose was selected to provide an alternative strategy in obtaining nitrocellulose with high nitrogen content from a non-cotton linter cellulose source.
